title: Port Scanner
shortDescription: A custom-built port scanner to scan local IPs at extremely high speeds.
description: Built from scratch using Python's socket library. Sends requests to localhost by using multithreading to bypass request time. Expandable structure using OOP and easily callable like 'Scanner.scan_ips()'
highlights: Scans a single port for all 65565 local IPs in seconds
reason: Once you want to scan IPs in your localhost, you realize how complicated the existing solutions are. I realized it when I wanted to scan my localhost, so I had to build a better scanner which can scan at extremely high speeds. I still use it in daily life.
